header__additional_info.info: Include additional information, disclaimers, or fine print with your announcement.

link.info: This will make the entire text function as a link. If you enable this, avoid inserting links in the announcement text.
link.label: Announcement link

button_link.info: Only needed if "Custom list" is selected as the Blog posts source. For "Selected blog", the blog's URL is used.

display_type.info: To customize your list, choose "Custom list" and add article blocks to the section.
display_type.label: Blog posts source

show_tags.info: Tags appear above titles like categories. Tags are configured in "Theme settings > Blog".
show_tags.label: Show tags

header_position.info: On mobile, the header is always above the content.
header_position.label: Header placement

collection_list.info: A maximum of 6 will be displayed.
collection_list.label: Collection list

filter_search_groups.info: Filter group names to enable filter search for. To enable on multiple filter groups, use a comma-separated list of filter names.
filter_search_groups.label: Filter search groups

header__tile_overlay.info: These settings are applicable when a background image is set.

paragraph__custom_collection_list.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose "Selected" and add collections to the collection list.

show_view_all.info: Appears at the end of the list if not all products are shown.
show_view_all.label: Show view all link

width.info: All blocks appear full width on mobile.
width.label: Block width

show_recaptcha_terms.info: Recommended if your store preferences have spam protection enabled.
show_recaptcha_terms.label: Show reCAPTCHA terms

title.info: Include a heading for your text. The heading functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.
title.label: Heading

collapse_on_mobile.info: Heading is required if this is enabled.
collapse_on_mobile.label: Collapse on mobile

desktop_width.info: For best results, ensure all footer block widths add up to 100%.
desktop_width.label: Desktop width

header__follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop).

show_title_on_desktop.info: The heading is always shown on smaller screen sizes.
show_title_on_desktop.label: Show heading on desktop

title.info: The heading functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.
title.label: Heading

payment__header.info: Only shows icons for payment types that your store supports.

subfooter_menu.info: This menu does not support sub navigation. Only top level links will be displayed.
subfooter_menu.label: Subfooter menu

background_color.info: Determines the background color of the block when no media is used, or when using the "Contain" option of the "Media fit" setting.
background_color.label: Background

link.info: This link also applies to the background and can be used without a button label.
link.label: Button link

width.info: For 100% and 66%, it's recommended to use the "Mobile image" setting below to ensure that the image can display at a proper resolution on mobile.
width.label: Width

enable_quick_sign_in.info: Customer accounts must be enabled on your store. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/customer-accounts/classic-customer-accounts).
enable_quick_sign_in.label: Enable quick sign-in menu

enable_transparent_background_tint.info: Adds a dimming gradient behind the transparent header to protect the legibility of text.
enable_transparent_background_tint.label: Enable background tint

enable_transparent_template_list.info: To enable on multiple page templates, use a comma-separated list of template names. Template types and suffixes apply (eg. "collection, product.landing, page.about").
enable_transparent_template_list.label: Enable on additional templates

header__featured_link.info: Highlight a top-level menu item with the custom color below. The mobile featured link is configured in the "Mobile menu" section.

header__logo.info: The mobile logo is configured in the "Mobile menu" section.

logo_transparent.info: The default logo will be used if no image is set.
logo_transparent.label: Logo image

paragraph__transparent_header.content: This setting requires a full-width section (eg. Image hero) as the template's first section. For a full list of supported full-width sections, check out [our documentation](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/pages/header/transparent-header).

desktop_alignment.info: On mobile, the icons will always be displayed in a centered bulleted slideshow.
desktop_alignment.label: Icon alignment

truncate_content.info: Recommended - this prevents the content from exceeding the height of the the image. When the content is truncated, a button to expand the content will be displayed.
truncate_content.label: Truncate content

paragraph__preview_image.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page's featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__store_title.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

paragraph__tags.content: Tags are configured in "Theme settings > Blog".

paragraph__cross_sells.content: Cross sells are configured in "Theme settings > Cart".

show_price_currency.label: Include currency ISO code in price

banner_image.content: The following images will override collection images and appear on all collections. To set different custom images for multiple collections, use a dynamic source. [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/collection-pages/banner#use-dynamic-sources-for-banner-image).

collection_description_truncate_num_line.info: When the description is truncated, a button will be added that expands the description when pressed.
collection_description_truncate_num_line.label: Truncate collection description

image.info: This image will override collection images and appear on all collections. To set different custom images for multiple collections, use a dynamic source. [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/collection-pages/banner#use-dynamic-sources-for-banner-image).
image.label: Image

pagination.info: Choose how additional pages of products are navigated.

paragraph__grid_limits.content: A maximum of 50 products can be shown per page.

paragraph.content: The password message field can be edited in Online Store > Preferences > [Password protection](/admin/online_store/preferences).

social_icons.content: Social media links are configured in "Theme settings > Social media".
social_icons.name: Social icons

custom_liquid.info: This will override the above text input.
custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

paragraph__sticky_atc_bar.content: When enabled, the sticky add to cart bar will only show when the buy buttons aren't visible.

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout).
show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons

heading.info: The heading will only appear when products are showing.
heading.label: Heading

product_source.info: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations).
product_source.label: Products to show

products_list.info: Add a [product reference metafield](/admin/metafields/product/create) (list of products) to set different items for each product.
products_list.label: Custom product list

instructions.info: Add instructions to describe how the custom option is applied to the product.
instructions.label: Instructions

line_properties__paragraph.content: If you're using multiple custom options in a product form, then make sure the field labels are unique. Learn more about [line item properties](https://shopify.dev/themes/architecture/templates/product#line-item-properties).

list_options.info: To support multiple options, use a comma-separated list (eg. "Option 1, Option 2, Option 3").
list_options.label: List options

add_box.info: Adjacent blocks placed in a box will be joined together. [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/product-pages/product-page-blocks/image-with-text-block).

popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
popup_page.label: Content

inventory_max.info: The initial quantity of your product inventory. To set different base quantities for multiple products, use a dynamic source. [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/product-pages/product-page-blocks/stock-level-indicator#use-dynamic-sources-for-multiple-products).
inventory_max.label: Inventory base quantity

low_inventory_threshold.info: The product inventory quantity that should alert customers when limited quantities are available. To set different thresholds for multiple products, use a dynamic source. [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/product-pages/product-page-blocks/stock-level-indicator#use-dynamic-sources-for-multiple-products).
low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold

show_inventory_transfer.info: Shows the incoming date for unavailable products. [Learn how to create inventory transfers](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/inventory/transfers/create-transfer).
show_inventory_transfer.label: Show inventory transfer notice

show_untracked_quantity.label: Use "In stock" status for untracked quantities

show_payment_icons.info: Only shows icons for payment types that your store supports.
show_payment_icons.label: Show payment icons

show_shop_pay.info: To display the banner, Shop Pay must be enabled for your store. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shop-pay-installments).
show_shop_pay.label: Show Shop Pay Installments banner

icon_border.info: Uses the "Accent" color for the border.

header__siblings.info: Display similar products as swatches. Set up "sibling" collections to group separate variant products using metafields. [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/product-pages/variant-options/sibling-product-swatches).

header__swatches.info: Swatches are configured in "Theme settings > Product".

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products (eg. a size guide).

variant_popup_option.info: The option name that will display a link to the information popup (eg. "Size").
variant_popup_option.label: Option name

variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
variant_popup_page.label: Content

enable_gift_card_recipient.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date, along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields).
enable_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards

paragraph__recommended_products_sidebar_.content: Sidebar products appear below the product overview on smaller screens.
Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations).

Product recommendations are dynamically generated, but can be manually assigned with the Shopify Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations).

show_arrow.info: Only applies to the "Text" link style.
show_arrow.label: Show arrow

paragraph.content: This template customizes the "Quick view" popover, and is shown when a customer uses the quick view button in product listings.

pagination.info: Choose how additional pages of results are navigated.

paragraph__grid_limits.content: A maximum of 50 results can be shown per page.

dropdown_parent_link.info: The main menu link that you'd like the menu to appear from.
dropdown_parent_link.label: Dropdown parent link

promo_width.info: The main navigation columns have a minimum width, so this percentage will apply as much as it can depending on the available space.
promo_width.label: Width

header__collection_images.info: This mega menu will only work correctly if all top-level items in the dropdown are links to collections.

show_product_subtitles.info: Product subtitles are configured through metafields. [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/products/product-listings#add-product-subtitles-with-metafields).
show_product_subtitles.label: Show product subtitles

settings.collection_image_overlay_note: These settings are applicable when Collection title style is set to "Overlay".

show_product_subtitle.info: Product subtitles are configured through metafields. [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/products/product-listings#add-product-subtitles-with-metafields).
show_product_subtitle.label: Show product subtitle

submenu_name.info: Leaving this blank will place the block in the main menu.
submenu_name.label: Submenu name

enable_quick_sign_in.info: Customer accounts must be enabled on your store. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/customer-accounts/classic-customer-accounts).
enable_quick_sign_in.label: Enable quick sign-in menu

header__featured_link.info: Highlight a top-level menu item with the custom color below. The desktop featured link is configured in the "Header" section.

show_social_media.info: Social media links are configured in "Theme settings > Social media".
show_social_media.label: Show social media icons

text_max_width.info: Applies as a maximum. Only applies on desktop.

enable_transparent.info: Ensure that you have a "Slideshow", "Video hero", or "Image hero" section as the first section on your password page.
enable_transparent.label: Enable on password page

continue_after_finished.label: Continue showing popup when timer is finished

decline_age_link.info: The link where customer will be sent if they don't agree to the age verification.
decline_age_link.label: Decline button link

disable_for_account_holders.info: The popup will not appear for customers who have already created an account on your store.
disable_for_account_holders.label: Disable for account holders

frequency.info: The length of time before a dismissed popup will show again.
frequency.label: Frequency

paragraph__sticky_tab.content: Show a tab when the popup is dismissed.

show_image_on_mobile.info: Doesn't apply if image position is set to "Background".
show_image_on_mobile.label: Show image on mobile

show_on_exit_intent.info: Only available to customers browsing on desktop.
show_on_exit_intent.label: Show on exit-intent

tags.info: Customers will be tagged with the values listed here. To support multiple tags, use a comma-separated list (eg. "newsletter, promotion").
tags.label: Tags

intro_paragraph.content: Popups are great for pushing customers to a particular sale or promotion. However, too many popups can overwhelm shoppers and create the wrong impression. Select the popup type that works best for you and limit the total amount as much as possible.

paragraph__customization.content: Product recommendations are dynamically generated, but can be manually assigned with the Shopify Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations).

paragraph__intro.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations).

custom_liquid.info: This will override the above text input
custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid

tab_heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
tab_heading.label: Tab heading

collection_list.info: A maximum of 4 collections will be shown.
collection_list.label: Collection list

enable_quick_cart.info: If the "Enable purchase confirmation popup" setting in "Theme settings > Cart" is disabled, then the quick cart will appear when a product is added to the cart.
enable_quick_cart.label: Enable quick cart

content_alignment.info: Only applies to the "Natural fit" options.

paragraph__links_1.content: To customize your links, choose "Custom list" and add "Link" blocks to this section.

paragraph__links_2.content: To display the links from a menu you created in the Shopify admin, choose Menu.

link.info: If the button label is blank, then the image will link to the url.
link.label: Button link

enable_section_animations.info: Each section will also offer the ability to opt out of animating.
enable_section_animations.label: Enable section animations

article_categories.info: All tags are used as categories by default. To use specific tags, use a comma-separated list (eg. "News, Lifestyle, Tutorials, Interviews").
article_categories.label: Article categories

cart_item_aspect_ratio.info: Applies to all cart item images within the quick cart, purchase confirmation popup, and cart template.
cart_item_aspect_ratio.label: Cart item image aspect ratio

cross_sells_max_products.label: Max number of products to show

enable_confirmation_popup.info: Confirmation popup will appear when a product has been added to the cart.
enable_confirmation_popup.label: Enable purchase confirmation popup

enable_cross_sells.info: Recommendations will show in the quick cart and cart template.
enable_cross_sells.label: Enable cross sells

enable_free_shipping_bar.info: The free shipping bar will show within the quick cart, purchase confirmation, and cart template.
enable_free_shipping_bar.label: Enable free shipping bar

free_shipping_threshold.info: Enter the value without a currency symbol, and use a decimal to separate dollars and cents (eg. "100.00").
free_shipping_threshold.label: Free shipping minimum amount

paragraph__cross_sells.content: Use cross sells to recommend additional products from a collection or product list.

paragraph__free_shipping_bar.content: Configuring the free shipping bar is separate from [configuring your actual shipping rates](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/free-shipping-rates#free-shipping-over-a-certain-value).

paragraph__low_inventory_warning.content: Items in the cart will display a warning if the current quantity remaining is below the low inventory threshold.

color_popups_drawer_alternate_background.info: For best results, use a color that contrasts subtly with the background color.
color_popups_drawer_alternate_background.label: Alternate background

header__floating_action_buttons.paragraph: Applies to  the quick view and + quick add buttons that appear overtop of product images.

paragraph__main_menu.content: Applies when the "Desktop layout" setting in the "Header" section is set to one of the "Menu below the logo" options.

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to "32 x 32px".
favicon.label: Favicon image

chip_options.info: The variant option name to use for displaying chips. To support multiple options, use a comma-separated list (eg. "Size, Material, Fabric").
chip_options.label: Variant option for chips

custom_swatch_colors.info: Add one color per line. Enter the exact variant option name followed by a colon and hex code (eg. "Sky Blue: #87CEEB"). [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/product-pages/variant-options/variant-swatches/use-custom-colors).
custom_swatch_colors.label: Custom swatch colors

enable_dynamic_product_options.info: Dynamically updates the appearance of swatch/chip options based on their availability. This saves customers from the effort of trying to add variants that are no longer available.
enable_dynamic_product_options.label: Enable

swatch_options.info: The variant option name to use for displaying swatches. To support multiple options, use a comma-separated list (eg. "Color, Style, Finish").
swatch_options.label: Variant option for swatches

product_badges.info: Product badges appear on product listings, and in the header of product pages.
product_badges.name: Product badges

header__custom_badges.info: For each group below, you can enter a comma-separated list of product tags that will appear as badges in the associated colors (eg. "Clearance, Deal").

new_badge_duration_in_days.info: The number of days, from the product's "Published at" date, that the "New" badge should show for.
new_badge_duration_in_days.label: Duration in days

new_badge_product_source.info: How to determine if a product is "new".
new_badge_product_source.label: "New" badge product source

product_listing_color_colored_tile.info: Applicable if the product list style is set to "Colored tile".
product_listing_color_colored_tile.label: Colored Tile

product_listing_content_alignment.info: Only applies when products are in "Grid" display mode.
product_listing_content_alignment.label: Content alignment

product_listing_product_title_text_limit.info: Limit how many lines of text is shown. Text that is cut off is replaced with an ellipsis (...). This has no effect on Collection and Search pages when products are in "List" display mode.
product_listing_product_title_text_limit.label: Product title text limit

product_listing_show_inventory_status.info: The low inventory threshold is configured in "Theme settings > Products".
product_listing_show_inventory_status.label: Show inventory status

product_listing_show_swatches.info: To learn more about setting up swatches and chips, check out our [documentation](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/product-pages/variant-options).
product_listing_show_swatches.label: Show swatches

quick_add_style.info: In "Grid" display mode, the "+" button will display over the image, and the "Add to cart" button will display below the text.  In "List" display mode, both will appear below the text.
quick_add_style.label: Quick add style

enable_header_search_product_types_choic.info: Allow customers to search within a specific [product type](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/details/product-type). We also recommend enabling the Product type filter in the Search & Discovery app so filters are applied on search pages.
enable_header_search_product_types_choic.label: Enable product type filter

header__predictive_search.info: The following settings control the appearance of the predictive search suggested results. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/storefront-search/predictive-search).

header__predictive_search_searchable_fie.info: The resource fields that should be searched. Will only apply if predictive search is enabled.

header__suggested_links.info: Display a list of suggested links when search bar is first opened.

header__suggested_searches.info: Display a custom list of search suggestions when search bar is first opened.

header_search_product_type_options.info: All product types are listed in the dropdown filter by default. To list specific types, use a comma-separated list (eg. "Bed Sheets, Blankets, Duvet Covers, Pillows").
header_search_product_type_options.label: Product types

paragraph__intro.content: You can manage the search results and search suggestion from the Search & Discovery app in the Shopify admin. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery).

predictive_search_max_result_size.info: The maximum number of results displayed for each content type.
predictive_search_max_result_size.label: Results per category

settings.content: Social media links are configured in "Theme settings > Social media".

background_image.paragraph: Adding a background image disables the color scheme and applies the image overlay colors instead.

header.info: Product badges are configured in "Theme settings > Product badges".

background_color.info: Used when no background image is selected.
background_color.label: Background color

multiple.info: Buttons are always centered in the footer position.
multiple.label: Buttons position

single.info: The button is always centered in the footer position.
single.label: Button position

image_crop.info: Only applies when the aspect ratio is "Square".
image_crop.label: Apply circle crop to images

background_color.info: Used when no background image is selected.
background_color.label: Background color

time_zone_selection.info: The time zone you want the countdown to be displayed in.
time_zone_selection.label: Time zone

enable_country_selector.info: To add a country, go to your [markets settings](/admin/settings/markets).
enable_country_selector.label: Enable country selector

enable_locale_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).
enable_locale_selector.label: Enable language selector

alt_text.info: Describe the context and purpose of the video for customers using screen readers.
alt_text.label: Video alt text

page_for_content.info: This will override the above text input.
page_for_content.label: Page for content

header__social_media.info: Social media links are configured in "Theme settings > Social media".

image_height_type.info: If you choose "Adapt to image", it's important that your images maintain the same shape between slides.

paragraph__custom_height.content: Custom heights are applied as a minimum height. If using large amounts of content within the slides, ensure these amounts are similar between slides.

image_overlay.note_background: These settings are applicable when a background image is set.
image_overlay.note_global_settings: Image overlay colors are configured in "Theme settings > Colors".
image_overlay.note_global_settings_video: Video overlay colors are configured in "Theme settings > Colors".

header.info: Applies to sections and features where text appears overtop of images.

desktop.info: Image is always placed above the content on mobile.
desktop.label: Desktop image position

media_fit.info: This will have no effect on images with a "Natural" aspect ratio.
media_fit.label: Media fit

num_columns.info: The section will set the appropriate number of columns for tablet and mobile screens.
num_columns.info_variable_results: At certain browser sizes fewer columns may be shown.
num_columns.label: Number of columns on desktop

num_rows.info: A "Show all" button will be displayed if there are more rows than what is shown. Not applicable if the slider is enabled.
num_rows.label: Number of rows on desktop

paragraph__filters_search.content: If a filter group has a long list of possible filter values, then you can help customers more easily find what they're looking for by adding a filter search to the group. This allows customers to enter a search term to refine the filter values that are shown.

show_button.info: Button automatically links to the product page.
show_button.label: Show "Shop now" button

header.info: To display ratings, add a [product rating app](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews).

enable_animation.info: Ensure section animations are enabled in "Theme settings > Animation".
enable_animation.label: Enable animation

show_chip_filters.info: Chip selectors are configured in "Theme settings > Product".
show_chip_filters.label: Show chip filters

show_filters.info: Allow customers to filter by product options, product type, price, availability, and more. [Customize filters](/admin/menus).
show_filters.label: Enable filtering

show_swatch_filters.info: These swatches mirror product variant selector swatches, and are configured in "Theme settings > Product". Shopify's [visual filters](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters#visual-filters) are configured separately. You can read more in our [help docs](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/collection-pages/filters-and-sorting).
show_swatch_filters.label: Show variant option swatch filters

truncate.info: When text is truncated, a button will be added that expands the text when pressed.
truncate.label: Truncate text

heading__video_url.info: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

video.info_fallback: The Shopify video's cover image will be displayed as a fallback in case it fails to load.
video.label: Shopify video

video_url.info: Accepts YouTube or Vimeo links. Video plays in the page.
video_url.label: YouTube or Vimeo URL

enable_os_share.info: Using the share button will open the built-in share sheet from the user's device. [Learn more](https://help.fluorescent.co/v/cornerstone/product-pages/product-page-blocks/default-blocks#enable-native-os-sharing).
enable_os_share.label: Enable native OS sharing

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page's featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).
